data.comment: Genk kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Genk kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Louis Verstraete (Oostende) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The away team have replaced Sebastien Dewaest with Neto Borges. This is the first substitution made today by Hannes Wolf.
Goal! Fashion Sakala gives Oostende a 1-0 lead.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
At Versluys Arena, Louis Verstraete has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
Genk's Theo Bongonda has been booked in Ostend.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Oostende kick-off.
Genk have been awarded a penalty in Ostend...
The match is now all square at 1-1 thanks to a penalty from Paul Onuachu.
Goal! A Theo Bongonda header gives Genk a 1-2 lead in Ostend.
Joseph Akpala is replacing Ronald Vargas for the home team.
Patrik Hrosovsky is on a sub for Kristian Thorstvedt for Genk.
Goal! Genk extend their lead to 1-3 through Junya Ito.
Mats Moller Daehli puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 1-4.
Oostende make their second substitution with Francois Marquet replacing Andrew Hjulsager.
Bryan Limbombe is replacing Mats Moller Daehli for Genk at Versluys Arena.
Goal! Francois Marquet pulls one back to make it 2-4.
Adnan Custovic (Oostende) is making a third substitution, with Renato Neto replacing Kevin Vandendriessche.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-4.
